title: Instructional Designer Competency Development Process Through Performance Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Case-based practical training reinforced considering adult workers' learning characteristics

learning_goals: Learners can apply systematic analysis (cause analysis, stakeholder collaboration) in instructional design according to performance-based approaches
Learners identify at least three additional value-creation elements when developing instructional design solutions for organizational performance improvement
Learners create design documents reflecting performance technology elements during team-based project implementation

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Supported App

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
